introduction.paragraphMessage1: This is an interactive dashboard using data from Statistics Canada on ‚ÄúNew motor vehicle registrations, quarterly, by geographic level from‚Äù from 2017-2024.
introduction.paragraphMessage2: The dashboard includes a bar chart and a line chart, showing different representations of the data, with customization of the different parameters of each chart.

lineChart.title: Annual, New Motor Vehicle Registrations
lineChart.paragraph: Every year since 2017, Statistics Canada has published data on New Motor Vehicle Registrations by fuel type. This graph includes gasoline, diesel, battery electric, plug-in hybrid electric, hybrid electric and other fuel types. Options to view diffferent year ranges, and different fuel types are available to the right of the chart.

barChart.title: New Motor Vehicle Registrations, by Fuel
barChart.paragraph: Every year since 2017, Statistics Canada has published data on New Motor Vehicle Registrations by fuel type. This graph includes gasoline, diesel, battery electric, plug-in hybrid electric, hybrid electric and other fuel types. Options to view a diffferent year and different provinces are available to the right of the chart.
